subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: After being dismissed from previous N.B.A. coaching stints, including with Golden State, where he was infamously choked by Latrell Sprewell, P.J. Carlesimo will take over as the Nets’ interim coach.
snippet: After being dismissed from previous N.B.A. coaching stints, including with Golden State, where he was infamously choked by Latrell Sprewell, P.J. Carlesimo will take over as the Nets’ interim coach.
